section.title: Adding new fields
section.para: You can add fields to forms either by its origin, or by selecting one type of form field. Let's see what has been created automatically for this purchase order form. To see a complete list of the available field types go to LINK_FIELD_TYPE SECTION

note.para: all the properties have been added by default, but are not still configured.

Notice the data model 'po' of type 'org.jbpm.examples.purchases.PurchaseOrder' is composed of three properties.
Simple : property of type text (description). We will adjust the view settings.
Complex: property of type object (header).
Complex: property of type array of objects (lines)

section.para: Now all these properties had to be configured.
